name: Roots Abyss
description:
A puzzle game about switching between the past and the present. You control two characters: an ancestor and a predecessor. The ancestor is an architect who can place blocks that will affect the present. The predecessor is an explorer who is uses the past objects to manipulate the present in order to explore deep in the ruins from the past. 

Controls: W,A,S,D to move, Arrow Keys to face direction, number to select blocks, R to restart and B / Left Click to place blocks

The game is still in development, more updates on the 12th

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 (Roots)

Developers: Jimmy and Kevin

Artist: Vincent
